newsitem.title: UK: LME base metals calm, steady in PM ring.
newsitem.headline: LME base metals calm, steady in PM ring.

text.p: COPPER - Edges higher in PM, building on moderate AM advances. Spread widens to $146/$148 backwardation, from $140 midday.
ZINC - Holding near day's new seven-year highs.
ALUMINIUM - Touch firmer in narrow range.
LEAD/NICKEL - Little changed from firmer AM.
